name: bc-ndshfsem3
description: Offizielles Repository zur Semesterarbeit NDS HF Applikationsentwickler im dritten Semester von Claudia Martinez & Marco Rensch

scripts.ci-test: cross-env NODE_ENV=citest DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=3800 DB_USER=root DB_PASSWORD=root DB_NAME=babylon cd server && npm run ci-test
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test concurrently -n=Server,Client -c=magenta,cyan "cd server && npm run test" "cd client && npm run test"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently -m=1 -n=Server,Client,Setup -c=magenta,cyan,yellow -i=true --default-input-target=2 "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.devStart: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently -n=Server,Client -c=magenta,cyan "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run serve"
